t: Amazon.com: Silver Patron Saints: CDs & Vinyl
s: I love Jesse Malin's music and this tribute album is both a worthy cause to help Jesse's during his rehab, plus it's just an amazing selection of music! Jesse Malin fans will obviously be biased toward the original version, but these covers are both heartfelt and worthy accessories too.

t: Jesse Malin - Sad and Beautiful World - Amazon.com Music
s: Musically and lyrically a continuation of Sunset Kids. Great production songwriting. Jesse should be huge. My only problem is not including purchased vinyl albums in your Amazon Music library. Purchasing an "Unlimited" service is like paying rent for something you already own.
